data.name: Legend of Hand - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The full official soundtrack for Legend of Hand - created by Bar aka 'Mr Poo'

Featuring 45 tracks! 83 minutes of original music.

1. Legend of Hand Title Theme (00:50)
2. Warrior's Oasis (07:37)
3. Master's Words (02:47)
4. Green Island Theme (11:23)
5. Wishful (02:01)
6. Sparring (02:26)
7. Master's Sting (00:33)
8. No Rules (01:06)
9. Hero Boogie (02:35)
10. Housebound Granny (01:53)
11. Blue Island Theme (00:47)
12. Fish Tickler (02:51)
13. Artisan (01:07)
14. Cave Crew (00:39)
15. Keys (00:41)
16. Clown Song (00:51)
17. Brazen Cant (01:07)
18. Bonafied (00:41)
19. Gallant Dance (00:39)
20. Island Groove (00:45)
21. Yellow Island Theme (02:04)
22. Confronting Fear (02:26)
23. Island Disco (03:14)
24. Journey Bop (00:37)
25. Fighting Talk (00:51)
26. Red Island Theme (00:46)
27. Told You So (01:11)
28. Convo (01:21)
29. Scars of Time (00:50)
30. Small Miracles (01:15)
31. Off The Handle (00:32)
32. Messenger's Words (01:14)
33. Miracle Room (02:09)
34. Mixup Palace (00:41)
35. Palace God (04:12)
36. Prison (01:42)
37. Right or Wrong (01:03)
38. Falling into an Abyss (00:39)
39. Nuissance (01:45)
40. Weeping Peaks (02:46)
41. Teddy Dragon Room (00:42)
42. Wretched Nerves Extended (04:18)
43. Last Chance (00:39)
44. The Final Walk (01:22)
45. End Credits (00:46)

data.short_description: The full official soundtrack for Legend of Hand - created by Bar aka 'Mr Poo'. Contains 45 tracks!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
